metadata.title: CVE-2024-0841 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the hugetlbfs_fill_superfunction in the Linux kernel hugetlbfs (HugeTLB pages) functionality. Thisissue may allow a local user to crash the system or potentially escalatetheir privileges on the system.
